Posts.Content: May 31, 2009 06:05AM lauraliz wrote: My Mom had her left breast removed 3 yrs ago and she just showed me a spot on the skin there that has a patch about the size of a quarter that is red and raised and tender, I am freaking out here.  Thankfully she sees her onc. on Tuesday!!
